actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce, acting through the Economic Development Administration to make grants for the repair, restoration, or replacement of vaulted sidewalks.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce, through the Economic Development Administration, to make grants for projects to repair vaulted sidewalks.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce, acting through the Economic Development Administration to make grants for the repair, restoration, or replacement of vaulted sidewalks.
